statements: SELECT * FROM payments
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, amount FROM payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT payment_id, amount, customer_id FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(payment_date) AS last_payment_date FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY last_payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_history
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount, customer_id FROM payment_history
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date, customer_id FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount > 100
SELECT customer_id, preferred_payment_method FROM customer_preferences
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount < 200 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_history;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_method FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM customer_spending ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_id, latest_purchase_date FROM customer_spending WHERE latest_purchase_date >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY latest_purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM payment_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_payments > 1000
SELECT customer_id, favorite_payment_method FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM customer_spending WHERE latest_purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT method_name, description FROM payment_methods WHERE method_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM payment_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT ph.payment_id, ph.amount, c.customer_name FROM payment_history ph JOIN customers c ON ph.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT ph.payment_date, c.customer_name, pm.method_name FROM payment_history ph JOIN customers c ON ph.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN payment_methods pm ON ph.payment_id = pm.method_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, ph.amount, t.transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN payment_history ph ON c.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN transactions t ON ph.payment_id = t.payment_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM Payments WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 2002 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, email, address FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.total_amount, Customers.name FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id
